messages.content: Write 3 concise bullets on why streaming responses are useful for UX.

outputs.text: {"provider": "KIMI", "model": "kimi-k2-0711-preview", "content": "- **Perceived speed**: Users see partial results instantly, making wait times feel shorter.  \n- **Progressive
